meanings.definition: The act of grooming or landscaping the appearance of a man's body hair.
meanings.sent1: He spent hours perfecting his manscapes before the big event.
meanings.sent2: His manscapes were always neat and well-maintained.
meanings.sent3: His manscapes were so tidy, even the birds mistook him for a tree!
meanings.sent4: His manscapes were like a carefully crafted masterpiece, each hair in its place.
meanings.sent5: The manscapes he created were a work of art, showcasing his attention to detail.

meanings.definition: The physical appearance or layout of a man's outdoor space or property.
meanings.sent1: The manscapes of his backyard were filled with colorful flowers and well-trimmed bushes.
meanings.sent2: His manscapes included a cozy patio area and a small vegetable garden.
meanings.sent3: His manscapes were so inviting that even the neighborhood cats loved to explore them.
meanings.sent4: The manscapes of his property resembled a peaceful oasis in the midst of the city.
meanings.sent5: Every corner of his manscapes reflected his love for nature and design.
